answers.answer: The toe will grow tissue and hopefully close up. I am by no mean telling u to do this its your choice, I took care of my husbands Grandfather and I cut open Vitimin E capsules and rubbed the oil on every night and the big hole closed up in a month. I don't know if u are putting any healing cream on it, did the Dr. give u any or advice? Keep his BS under tight control and have him be carful with his diet. If your BS are to out of control u don't heal well.
